DelayEffect.name: Delay Effect
DelayEffect.description: Complete delay effect with feedback control and wet/dry mix. Creates echo and rhythmic delay effects.

ReverbChapel.name: Chapel Reverb
ReverbChapel.description: Warm, musical reverb from Spokane Woman's Club chapel. Real impulse response from OpenAir library. Great for vocals and acoustic instruments.

ReverbMausoleum.name: Mausoleum Reverb
ReverbMausoleum.description: Hamilton Mausoleum - one of the longest natural reverbs in the world (~15s decay). Real impulse response from OpenAir. Epic, cathedral-like sound.

ReverbStairwell.name: Stairwell Reverb
ReverbStairwell.description: Concrete stairwell with bright, reflective reverb. Real impulse response from OpenAir. Adds presence and brightness.

ReverbBasement.name: Basement Reverb
ReverbBasement.description: Small basement room with tight, intimate reverb. Real impulse response from OpenAir. Good for subtle ambience.

EnvelopeADSR.name: ADSR Envelope
EnvelopeADSR.description: Attack-Decay-Sustain-Release envelope generator with trigger input. Shape audio amplitude over time.

inputs.name: gate
inputs.description: Audio signal to shape with envelope

ChorusEffect.name: Chorus Effect
ChorusEffect.description: Classic chorus effect using multiple delayed copies with LFO modulation. Creates rich, shimmering sounds.

FilterSweep.name: Filter Sweep
FilterSweep.description: Resonant filter with LFO modulation for wah, sweep, and auto-filter effects. Classic synth sound shaping.

Tremolo.name: Tremolo
Tremolo.description: Classic tremolo effect with LFO-controlled amplitude modulation. Creates pulsing, rhythmic volume changes.

AutoPanner.name: Auto Panner
AutoPanner.description: Automatic stereo panning controlled by LFO. Creates moving spatial effects.

inputs.name: depth
inputs.description: Panning depth (0-1, where 1 is full L-R sweep)

RingModulator.name: Ring Modulator
RingModulator.description: Classic ring modulation effect for robotic, metallic, and bell-like sounds. Multiplies input with carrier oscillator.

SimpleLFO.name: Simple LFO
SimpleLFO.description: Low Frequency Oscillator for modulating other parameters. Outputs control signal for filters, panning, etc.

OscillatorBank.name: Oscillator Bank
OscillatorBank.description: Three detuned oscillators for rich, full synth sounds. Sawtooth waves with slight pitch variations.

CompressorPreset.name: Compressor Preset
CompressorPreset.description: Pre-configured dynamics compressor for controlling audio levels. Smooths out volume variations.

PhaserEffect.name: Phaser Effect
PhaserEffect.description: Classic phaser effect using cascaded allpass filters with LFO modulation. Creates sweeping, swirling sounds.
